title: Chhota Bheem - Neeli Pahaadi
casts: Vatsal Dubey, Julie Tejwani, Rupa Bhimani, Jigna Bhardwaj, Rajesh Kava, Mousam, Swapnil
description: Things get spooky when Bheem and his buddies travel to the border of Dholakpur, known for its eerie history and rumored to be haunted.

title: Chhota Bheem & Ganesh
casts: Vatsal Dubey, Julie Tejwani, Rupa Bhimani, Jigna Bhardwaj, Rajesh Kava, Mousam, Swapnil
description: Bheem and Lord Ganesha join forces to save Dholakpur from fire-spitting dragons, who have also captured Ganesh’s mouse companion!

title: Chhota Bheem & Krishna: Mayanagari
casts: Vatsal Dubey, Julie Tejwani, Rupa Bhimani, Jigna Bhardwaj, Rajesh Kava, Mousam, Swapnil
description: Young lord Krishna has fallen for demoness Maayandri’s revenge plot against him! Can Bheem rescue him and thwart Maayandri’s other destructive plans?

title: Chhota Bheem & Krishna: Pataliputra- City of the Dead
casts: Vatsal Dubey, Julie Tejwani, Rupa Bhimani, Jigna Bhardwaj, Rajesh Kava, Arun Shekher, Sanchit Wartak
description: Krishna needs Bheem’s help: The ruined city of Pataliputra has been cursed! Can the friends do what it takes to bring light back into this town?

title: Chhota Bheem And The Broken Amulet
casts: Vatsal Dubey, Julie Tejwani, Rupa Bhimani, Jigna Bhardwaj, Rajesh Kava, Mousam, Swapnil
description: When a stranger tries to steal an amulet from the palace, Bheem learns the sad story behind the ornament and heads to Africa to defeat the real villain.

title: Chhota Bheem And The Crown of Valhalla
casts: Vatsal Dubey, Julie Tejwani, Rupa Bhimani, Jigna Bhardwaj, Rajesh Kava, Mousam, Swapnil
description: To save the kingdom of Valhalla from invasion by Vikings, Bheem is gathering his army of friends, who are ready to put up a formidable fight!

title: Chhota Bheem and the Incan Adventure
casts: Vatsal Dubey, Julie Tejwani, Rupa Bhimani, Jigna Bhardwaj, Rajesh Kava, Mousam, Swapnil
description: When Dholakpur’s princess is kidnapped, Bheem is off to the land of the Incas to save her, but he’s in for an even bigger challenge upon his arrival.

title: Chhota Bheem and The ShiNobi Secret
casts: Vatsal Dubey, Julie Tejwani, Rupa Bhimani, Jigna Bhardwaj, Rajesh Kava, Mousam, Swapnil
description: After learning of a samurai village under threat by their own emperor, Bheem sets off for Japan to offer his help.

title: Chhota Bheem Aur Hanuman
casts: Vatsal Dubey, Julie Tejwani, Rupa Bhimani, Jigna Bhardwaj, Rajesh Kava, Mousam, Swapnil
description: When two evil entities kidnap a princess in a plot to build a new kingdom, Bheem takes them on with the help of the courageous monkey god Hanuman.

title: Chhota Bheem aur Krishna
casts: Vatsal Dubey, Julie Tejwani, Rupa Bhimani, Jigna Bhardwaj, Rajesh Kava, Arun Shekher, Sanchit Wartak
description: Centuries after the end of a conqueror's rule, he is mysteriously back from the dead. It’s up to Bheem to save Dholakpur from being taken over!

title: Chhota Bheem aur Krishna vs Zimbara
casts: Vatsal Dubey, Julie Tejwani, Rupa Bhimani, Jigna Bhardwaj, Rajesh Kava, Mousam, Swapnil
description: A demon of darkness is plotting world domination — but when Bheem and Krishna catch wind of his plans, they’ll stop at nothing to destroy him.

title: Chhota Bheem: Bheem vs Aliens
casts: Vatsal Dubey, Julie Tejwani, Rupa Bhimani, Jigna Bhardwaj, Rajesh Kava, Mousam, Swapnil
description: Space invaders have kidnapped Dholakpur’s king and princess! The only way Bheem can rescue them? Defeat the aliens in a cricket match.

title: Chhota Bheem: Dholakpur to Kathmandu
casts: Vatsal Dubey, Julie Tejwani, Rupa Bhimani, Jigna Bhardwaj, Rajesh Kava, Mousam, Swapnil
description: Bheem’s holiday in Nepal takes an unexpected turn when he is called on to save a monkey cub from snow leopards and reunite him with his father.

title: Chhota Bheem: Dus Pe Dus
casts: Vatsal Dubey, Julie Tejwani, Rupa Bhimani, Jigna Bhardwaj, Rajesh Kava, Mousam, Swapnil
description: After a precious temple stone is stolen under his watch, Bheem trains in a special martial art to prepare for a showdown with the thief.

title: Chhota Bheem: Journey to Petra
casts: Vatsal Dubey, Julie Tejwani, Rupa Bhimani, Jigna Bhardwaj, Rajesh Kava
description: The king has been away to meet an old friend, but when he sends for urgent help, Bheem finds himself on an action-packed rescue mission to Egypt!

title: Chhota Bheem: Master of Shaolin
casts: Pooja Punabi, Mausam, Julie Tejwani, Rupa Bhimani, Jigna Bhardwaj, Rajesh Kava, Parigna Pandya
description: Summoned by a monk to help reclaim a temple from a dangerous leader, Bheem must master the Shaolin kung fu techniques if he wants a fighting chance!

title: Chhota Bheem: The Rise of Kirmada
casts: Vatsal Dubey, Julie Tejwani, Rupa Bhimani, Jigna Bhardwaj, Rajesh Kava, Mousam, Swapnil
description: Bheem and young lord Krishna team up to protect the world against the wicked and powerful Kirmada and his equally dangerous bat army.

title: Chhota Bheem and the Curse of Damyaan
casts: Kaustav Ghosh, Jigna Bhardwaj, Chutki, Rajesh Kava, Mausam, Guru Shambu, Arun Shekar, Julie Tejwani, Anamaya Verma
description: An evil demon who traded his freedom for immortality lures Chhota Bheem and his friends to the city of Sonapur with tales of hidden treasure.

title: Mighty Raju Rio Calling
director: Rajiv Chilaka, Anirban Majumder, Alka Amarkant Dubey
description: Mighty Raju preps for a new adventure in Rio de Janeiro, where he goes toe-to-toe with rival soccer players, faces capoeira fighters and more.

title: Bheemayan
description: It's Diwali! To celebrate, Chhota Bheem and his friends put on a stage show of the Ramayana, re-enacting the epic story behind the festival of lights.

title: Chhota Bheem Kungfu Dhamaka
casts: Sonal Kaushal, Rupa Bhimani, Jigna Bharadhwaj, Sabina Malik, Julie Tejwani, Rajesh Kava, Vaibhav Thakkar, Samriddhi Shuklaa, Aditya Raj Sharma, Vinod Kulkarni
description: Chhota Bheem is in China for a martial arts competition but his real challenge: to save the emperor’s daughter from being kidnapped by the villain Zuhu!

title: Dragonkala Ka Rahasya
description: Bheem helps to reopen Dragonpur's abandoned magic and martial arts school, but is tested like never before when an ex-student returns seeking revenge!
